app.title: Thaumic Cast
speakers.none: No Sonos speakers have made themselves known
speakers.scan_hint: Ensure you're on the same network as your speakers, then give it a go.
server.restart_description: Closes and reopens the app, as one does
server.disconnect_description: Politely but firmly closes all extension connections
settings.autostart_description: Have Thaumic Cast ready and waiting when you arrive
network.degraded_warning: Speakers were discovered but seem reluctant to communicate. VPN or firewall may be the culprit.
onboarding.welcome.title: Welcome to Thaumic Cast
onboarding.welcome.subtitle: The server side of the equation
onboarding.welcome.body: This application acts as the bridge between your browser and your Sonos speakers. It lurks quietly in your system tray, ready to channel audio when called upon.
onboarding.welcome.footnote: Think of it as a very dedicated postal service for sound.
onboarding.firewall.title: A Brief Interruption
onboarding.firewall.subtitle: Windows would like a word
onboarding.firewall.warning_text: In a moment, Windows will likely ask for permission to allow network access. This is normal and entirely necessary.
onboarding.firewall.reason_1: Your browser extension needs to send audio data to this app
onboarding.firewall.reason_2: This app needs to communicate with your Sonos speakers
onboarding.firewall.reason_3: All traffic stays on your local network — nothing leaves your home
onboarding.firewall.reassurance: Click 'Allow' when Windows asks. We promise not to do anything nefarious with your trust.
onboarding.speakers.title: Discovering Speakers
onboarding.speakers.subtitle: Let's find your Sonos devices
onboarding.speakers.none_found_hint: Speakers can be shy. Check that they're powered on and connected to the same network as this computer.
onboarding.extension.title: The Browser Extension
onboarding.extension.subtitle: The other half of the equation
onboarding.extension.body: You'll need the Thaumic Cast browser extension to capture audio from your tabs. It's the bit that does the actual capturing.
onboarding.extension.skip_hint: You can always install it later from the Chrome Web Store.
onboarding.ready.title: Configuration Complete
onboarding.ready.subtitle: You're ready to cast audio
onboarding.ready.performance_body: Audio latency is typically 100–300ms over local network. This is ideal for music and video, though gamers may find it... educational.
onboarding.ready.tip_1: Wired connections are more reliable than WiFi
onboarding.ready.tip_2: Close proximity to your router helps
onboarding.ready.tip_3: 5GHz WiFi generally outperforms 2.4GHz for this purpose
